properties.name: bot-datasource.host
properties.description: Define where the mysql server is. If not set, in-memory storage will be used.

properties.name: bot-datasource.username
properties.description: Define the username used to connect to the datasource

properties.name: bot-datasource.password
properties.description: Define the password used to connect to the datasource

properties.name: bot-datasource.timezone
properties.description: Define the timezone used to store date into the datasource

properties.name: bot-datasource.path
properties.description: Define the path of the in-memory storage. If not set, data will be lost at bot reboot.
